lead_paragraph: Arsenal opened a 5-point lead in the English Premier League with a 2-0 victory over Blackburn on goals by Philippe Senderos and Emmanuel Adebayor. Senderos scored his second goal of the season off Eduardo da Silva’s corner kick in the fourth minute. Blackburn goalkeeper Brad Friedel made a string of saves before Adebayor got his 19th goal of the season in injury time, tying Manchester United’s Cristiano Ronaldo for the league lead. Seeking its first league title since 2004, Arsenal (19-1-6) has 63 points with 12 games remaining but still must play league matches at Manchester United and at Chelsea, its two closest challengers.
